data.title: Gordon Ramsay shares wedding snap to celebrate anniversary
data.meta_description: Celebrity TV chef Gordon Ramsay and his wife Tana are celebrating 22 years of marriage. Read more about their celebrations here.
data.text:
Gordon Ramsay and his wife Tana are celebrating 22 years of marriage.

The TV chef shared a throwback wedding snap to Instagram on Friday to mark the occasion.

In the photo, the couple – who tied the knot in 1996 – look over the moon with Tana gazing lovingly at her hubby during their special day.

Read more: Gordon Ramsay reveals he wore son Jack’s pants after he went to university

Gordon captioned the post: “22yrs today…. happy anniversary gorgeous @tanaramsay.”

Fans rushed to comment on the snap with one person writing: “Congratulations and happy anniversary.”

Another said: “Congratulations to you both. Have a wonderful Day!” while a third added: “Congratulations you two, happy anniversary!! Here’s to many more.”

The couple’s daughter Holly, 18, paid tribute to her parents on the special occasion.

She wrote on Instagram: “Happy 22nd anniversary to the two most important people I know, thank you for everything.”

Holly and her twin brother Jack recently moved away for university after passing their A-Levels with flying colours.

But Gordon, 52, admitted he was struggling with his kids not being at home.

In October, the star revealed wearing Jack’s pants made him realise just how much he missed him.

Gordon borrowed some underwear from the only other male in his household when Jack moved away from home.

And it was only when he put the garments on that he realised how much he wanted his son, who is studying at Exeter University, to be back home.

Holly has also moved out of home – even though she’s studying not far from her family home.

During an appearance on US programme The Late Late Show with James Corden, Gordon said: “Holly has gone to uni in London, she’s even moved out and we live in London.

“I said, ‘Why are you moving out?’ She said, ‘Peace. Quiet. I can get back at 4 in the morning without you saying ‘What you doing at 4 in the morning.'”

Read more: Gordon Ramsay treats his twins to dinner to celebrate A-Level results

The couple’s daughter Tilly, 17, is now the only one of Gordon and Tana’s children living with them and they want to do all they can to get her to stay.

He quipped: “[She’s our] princess, we’re slowing down the studies and asking if she can leave home at 25, manipulation.”

The couple are also parents to daughter Megan, 20.
